thread.title: Daddy cool Karan Johar is back in the town – view HQ pics
thread.title_full: Daddy cool Karan Johar is back in the town – view HQ pics

author: Rajat Tripathi
title: Daddy cool Karan Johar is back in the town – view HQ pics
text:
Karan Johar remembers My Name Is Khan on its 7th anniversary, does not mention Kajol in his tweet 
Last night, news broke that Karan Johar has become a father to twins – Roohi and Yash. The kids were born via surrogate mother on February 7. Karan, who was not in town when the news started making the rounds, has made a fashionable entry, and how. The filmmaker was spotted at the Mumbai airport. And this has to be his most stylish entry ever. Seriously, this one beats all the fabulous entries made by Karan on his chat show Koffee with Karan, and anywhere else. He was dressed in a black henley T shirt that he topped with a long military camouflage hoodie. Blue denim jean, and stylish yet simple black sneakers added more to his style statement. And a fabulous pair of sunglasses provided the finishing touch to the look. Seriously, for this outing he gets a 10 on 10. Not only he was casual, but maintained a sense of style at the same time. He is indeed going to be stylish dad. Roohi and Yash will never have trouble explaining fashion to their proud father. 
Just look at those super sleek shades! 
That jacket is sick! 
A look at Kjo’s shoes! We are trying to find those shoes on online stores as well. 
And the trademark Karan Johar pout 
Early in the morning, Karan released a statement confirming the news, and expressed how he felt. “I feel enormously blessed to be a parent to these pieces of my heart who were welcomed into this world with the help of the marvels of medical science. This was an emotional yet well thought out decision which I have taken after considering all the responsibilities and duties that come with being a parent. In order to arrive at this decision, I have prepared myself mentally, physically, emotionally and logistically to ensure that my children get all the unconditional love, care and attention from me and mine,” the statement read. 
All we gotta say is that Karan Johar sure knows how to make stylish entry. 
Bollywood has been wishing the filmmaker on Twitter since morning. Priyanka Chopra, Alia Bhatt, Varun Dhawan, Sushant Singh Rajput – have all congratulated him. Published: March 5, 2017 12:59 pm Topics:
